entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,769Chapters: 5/23Kudos: 124

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,071Chapters: 25/50Kudos: 203

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: i got the trigger, but you hold the gun
entry.summary:
Author: thequeenvic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,454Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: Jason’s eyes widen at the noise, his grip on the gun loosening just a little. Then, as fast as it loosens, it tightens again. “Oh, Dickie,” he purrs, his tone softer now, but no less dangerous, the hand on Dick’s jaw letting go to instead settle in his hair, grabbing a fistful and pulling harshly as he tilts Dick’s head up. Dick moans again, the pain sending shockwaves of pleasure through his body to his groin. Jason gets in close to Dick’s face, close enough so Dick can see his eyes darkening, all pupil and no iris. “If that’s how you want to play this,” he chuckles darkly, “then let’s play.”    Kinktober day 22: gun play

entry.title: Flying without a line
entry.summary:
Author: vierasfics

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,819Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 81

Summary: Dick Grayson's life can be summarised as persistent attempts to do good, only to have his hands covered in blood. When the Court could not fully break him, they decided, instead, to create in him a synthetic drug addiction for the next kill. Now that they are gone, Deathstroke the Terminator has set his eyes on this perfect weapon. Red Hood might just be the only person that can help him.orDick Grayson never got to be Robin. Shortly after Bruce met him, he was kidnapped by the Court of Owls. Bruce named his next protegé, Jason, after his memory. Now Dick has to struggle under a pressure he never wanted.

entry.title: eyes roll back in ecstasy
entry.summary:
Author: polybatcest

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,223Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: Dick is too far away to make out any real details about the boy across the club, but his hair catches Dick’s eye—rusty red, with a streak of white right up front. He wonders if the kid bleached it or something. Dick moves closer. No reaction from the kid. Even when Dick sits down right next to him, he doesn’t look at Dick, just stares off at nothing with a transfixed yet unfocused gaze. Dick’s not sure what he’s on, but judging by how wide his pupils are blown open, he’s on something. His entire demeanor is nervous, skittish, on constant alert for danger. Dick recognizes the look on his face: his instinct for constant alertness is at war with the drugs dulling his senses, and it’s freaking him out. Dick leans in close to be heard over the music and says, “Hey, you alright, kid?”One year before Red Hood will make his first appearance in Gotham City, Jason Todd gets a little too high at a rave. Dick is too high himself to realize that the boy he's comforting is his supposed-to-be-dead little brother—which becomes very apparent when he invites Jason back to his hotel room.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 601,769Chapters: 55/60Kudos: 1,554

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more. . . . Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 142,052Chapters: 29/42Kudos: 1,135

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.
